title: I'm devastated. My family convinced me to go on vacation with them and leave my foster kittens with GC brother. I (17f) didn't want to go and wanted to stay home. Came back from vacation to find my foster kittens in terrible condition and one dead. Everyone yelled at me for my reaction

author: Flock_with_me
text: It is a disturbing story, but it's not OK to attack the OP over it. They are feeling terrible about it, and they are a minor who was raised in an abusive environment.

author: adollarmight
text: OOF. YOURE RIGHT. I DID NOT SEE HER AGE. AND YES HER AGE IS THE ONLY THING THAT MAKES THIS OKAY AT ALL. I APOLOGIZE AND FUCK HER ENTIRE FAMILY.
